content.html: I read the Harry Potter series while incarcerated. Those books helped me get through some really tough times. Yet I'll never pick one up again because I value the lives of trans folks over a book series (or silly game). Because that's what we're discussing here.
content.value:
I read the Harry Potter series while incarcerated. Those books helped me get through some really tough times. Yet I'll never pick one up again because I value the lives of trans folks over a book series (or silly game).

Because that's what we're discussing here.
